languages.text: {n}Кибелла поднимает руку с черепом до уровня ваших глаз и щелкает костяной челюстью.{/n} "Выродок. Бывший враг твой. Вечный враг Его. Мой нынешний спутник-в-тенях и трофей. Раньше ты знал{mf||а} его под именем Немезит, но мне показалось, что "Немо" подходит ему больше".

{n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла поднимает руку с черепом до уровня ваших глаз и щелкает костяной челюстью.{/n} "Выродок. Бывший враг твой. Вечный враг Его. Мой нынешний спутник-в-тенях и трофей. Раньше ты знал{mf||а} его под именем Немезит, но мне показалось, что "Немо" подходит ему больше".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah holds up the skull to your eye level and clacks its bony jaw.{/n} "An anathema. You former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but I thought that 'Nemo' suits him better."

{n}Kibellah holds up the skull to your eye level and clacks its bony jaw.{/n} "An anathema. You former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but I thought that 'Nemo' suits him better."

{n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."

{n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face and snaps its jaw shut.{/n} "An anathema. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but I think 'Nemo' suits him better."

{n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."

{n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."

{n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah levanta la calavera hacia ti.{/n} «Una aberración. Su antiguo enemigo. Su enemigo eterno. Mi nuevo compañero en las sombras y mi trofeo. En el pasado lo conoció con el nombre de Nemesitio, pero ahora se llama Nemo».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah levanta la calavera hacia ti.{/n} «Una aberración. Su antiguo enemigo. Su enemigo eterno. Mi nuevo compañero en las sombras y mi trofeo. En el pasado lo conoció con el nombre de Nemesitio, pero ahora se llama Nemo».

languages.text: {n}キベラは頭蓋骨をあなたの眼前に突きつける。{/n}「異形よ。あなたのかつての敵。主の永遠の敵。私の新たな影の仲間であり戦利品。かつてはネメサイトという名前で知られていただろうけれど、今の名前は『ネモ』よ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは頭蓋骨をあなたの眼前に突きつける。{/n}「異形よ。あなたのかつての敵。主の永遠の敵。私の新たな影の仲間であり戦利品。かつてはネメサイトという名前で知られていただろうけれど、今の名前は『ネモ』よ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈将手里的头骨举到你面前。{/n}“是个怪物，是你曾经的敌人，也是祂永恒的敌人。他是我的新任影子伙伴，也是我的战利品。你之前称他为涅墨斯特，但他现在叫做‘涅墨’。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈将手里的头骨举到你面前。{/n}“是个怪物，是你曾经的敌人，也是祂永恒的敌人。他是我的新任影子伙伴，也是我的战利品。你之前称他为涅墨斯特，但他现在叫做‘涅墨’。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah hält dir den Schädel vors Gesicht.{/n} "Eine Abscheulichkeit. Euer einstiger Feind. Sein ewiger Feind. Mein neuer Gefährte in den Schatten und meine Trophäe. Ihr kanntet ihn einst als Nemesit, aber nun lautet sein Name Nemo."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah hält dir den Schädel vors Gesicht.{/n} "Eine Abscheulichkeit. Euer einstiger Feind. Sein ewiger Feind. Mein neuer Gefährte in den Schatten und meine Trophäe. Ihr kanntet ihn einst als Nemesit, aber nun lautet sein Name Nemo."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah vous brandit le crâne sous le nez.{/n} « Une aberration. Votre défunt ennemi. Son éternel adversaire. Mon nouveau compagnon-dans-l'ombre et mon trophée. Vous l'avez connu autrefois sous le nom de Némésite, mais désormais, il s'appelle Némo. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah vous brandit le crâne sous le nez.{/n} « Une aberration. Votre défunt ennemi. Son éternel adversaire. Mon nouveau compagnon-dans-l'ombre et mon trophée. Vous l'avez connu autrefois sous le nom de Némésite, mais désormais, il s'appelle Némo. »

languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, kafatasını yüzüne doğru tutuyor.{/n} "Yoldan çıkan birisi. Eski düşmanın. O'nun ebedî düşmanı. Gölgelerdeki yeni yoldaşım ve ganimetim. Bir zamanlar Nemezit diye tanırdın. Artık adı Nemo."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah holds the skull up to your face.{/n} "An aberration. Your former foe. His eternal foe. My new companion-in-shadow and my trophy. You once knew him by the name Nemesite, but now, his name is Nemo."
